title: White Large Square

adjectives: Forming a right angle, especially at right angles with the mast or the keel, and parallel to the horizon; said of the yards of a square-rigged vessel when they are so braced.
Having four equal sides and four right angles or forming a right angle

description: A square shown in the shade of white. May be used to represent anything white.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the white large square emoji is a minimalist yet impactful element, presented with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges, creating a clean and modern aesthetic. Its pure white surface, subtly shaded to suggest depth and form, makes it a versatile building block for visual communication or a symbol of clarity and a fresh start. This emoji on Apple devices can be used to create visual patterns, represent a blank canvas, or signify a pause and reset in a conversation.
